title: Ziggurat Cuisine
typeOfFood: Indian, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, African, Cameroonian, Nigerian, Ethiopian, African, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located on the ground floor of Sunette Tower in Makati City, this African restaurant offers a variety dishes from four different cultural backgrounds, including vegetarian/vegan ones. Sample veg suitable dishes include the Cameroonian pawpaw soup, North African couscous, Nigerian vegetable and pulse stew, Ethiopian bamya alich'a, and the Eritrean pumpkin zigni. The menu offers suggestions for vegetarian dishes with information about ingredients and cooking methods.
streetAddress: Tigris corner Euphrates Streets, Makati City
